# Spells (Alphabetical List - O)
## Oa-Oe
**[[Oath of Blood (Spell)|Oath of Blood]]****:** Extends a geas beyond death that compels the target to animate and continue her quest as undead.

**[[Oath of Peace (Spell)|Oath of Peace]]:** Grants +5 AC and DR 10/evil, can’t attack.

**[[Obedient Avalanche (Spell)|Obedient Avalanche]]****:** Snowy avalanche crushes and buries your foes.

**[[Obscure Object (Spell)|Obscure Object]]****:** Masks object against scrying.

**[[Obscuring Mist (Spell)|Obscuring Mist]]****:** Fog surrounds you.

**[[Obscuring Snow (Spell)|Obscuring Snow]]****:** Obscures sight in a 30-ft. radius around the caster.

## Of-Oj
**[[Ogre's Form (Spell)|Ogre’s Form]]:** You take the form of an ogre.

## Ok-Oo
**[[Old Salt's Curse (Spell)|Old Salt's Curse]] <sup>R</sup>:** Permanently sicken someone, worse if target is on or in the water far from shore.

**[[Omen of Peril (Spell)|Omen of Peril]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** You know how dangerous the future will be.

**[[One Mind (Spell)|One Mind]]****:** As *[[One Mind, Lesser (Spell)|lesser one mind]]*, but also gain +2 to attack while mounted.

**[[One Mind, Greater (Spell)|One Mind, Greater]]****:** As *[[One Mind (Spell)|one mind]]*, but also gain +2 to damage while mounted.

**[[One Mind, Lesser (Spell)|One Mind, Lesser]]****:** You gain +4 on [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] (v3.5 Spot and Listen) checks while mounted.

**[[One with Nature (Spell)|One with Nature]]****:** Link with nature gives a +2 bonus on nature-related skill checks.

**[[Oozepuppet (Spell)|Oozepuppet]]****:** You can telekinetically control target ooze.

**[[Overcompensation (Spell)|Overcompensation]]:** Weapon increases size and damage.

## Op-Ot
**[[Opalescent Glare (Spell)|Opalescent Glare]]****:** Kill creatures with a look, or make them very afraid.

**[[Open_Close (Spell)|Open/Close]]****:** Opens or closes small or light things.

**[[Open Greater Chakra (Spell)|Open Greater Chakra]]****:** Allow target to bind to its arms, brow, crown, feet, hands, shoulders, throat, or waist chakra.

**[[Open Least Chakra (Spell)|Open Least Chakra]]****:** Allow target to bind to its crown, feet, or hands chakra.

**[[Open Lesser Chakra (Spell)|Open Lesser Chakra]]****:** Allow target to bind to its arms, brow, crown, feet, hands, or shoulders chakra.

**Oppressive Boredom:** Target loses its next action.

**[[Opportune Dodge (Spell)|Opportune Dodge]]****:** Subject can avoid a single attack of opportunity.

**[[Oracle's Burden (Spell)|Oracle's Burden]]:** Creature is affected by negative oracle's curse effects.

**[[Orb of Acid (Spell)|Orb of Acid]]****:** Ranged touch, 1d6/level acid damage and subject might be [[Sickened|sickened]].

**[[Orb of Acid, Lesser (Spell)|Orb of Acid, Lesser]]****:** Ranged touch attack deals 1d8 acid damage + 1d8/2 levels beyond 1st (max 5d8).

**[[Orb of Cold (Spell)|Orb of Cold]]****:** Ranged touch, 1d6/level cold damage and subject might be [[Blinded|blinded]].

**[[Orb of Cold, Lesser (Spell)|Orb of Cold, Lesser]]****:** Ranged touch attack deals 1d8 cold damage + 1d8/2 levels beyond 1st (max 5d8).

**[[Orb of Dancing Death (Spell)|Orb of Dancing Death]]****:** Orb you control bestows 1 negative level each round.

**[[Orb of Electricity (Spell)|Orb of Electricity]]****:** Ranged touch, 1d6/level electricity damage and subject might be [[Entangled|entangled]].

**[[Orb of Electricity, Lesser (Spell)|Orb of Electricity, Lesser]]****:** Ranged touch attack deals 1d8 electricity damage + 1d8/2 levels beyond 1st (max 5d8).

**[[Orb of Fire (Spell)|Orb of Fire]]****:** Ranged touch, 1d6/level fire damage and subject might be [[Dazed|dazed]].

**[[Orb of Fire, Lesser (Spell)|Orb of Fire, Lesser]]****:** Ranged touch attack deals 1d8 fire damage + 1d8/2 levels beyond 1st (max 5d8).

**[[Orb of Force (Spell)|Orb of Force]]****:** Globe of force deals 1d6/level damage (max 10d6).

**[[Orb of Sound (Spell)|Orb of Sound]]****:** Ranged touch, 1d4/level sonic damage and subject might be [[Deafened|deafened]].

**[[Orb of Sound, Lesser (Spell)|Orb of Sound, Lesser]]****:** Ranged touch attack deals 1d6 sonic damage + 1d6/2 levels beyond 1st (max 5d6).

**[[Orchid's Drop (Spell)|Orchid’s Drop]] <sup>M</sup>:** Heal 2d10 points of damage when you drink a mutagen, gain +2 bonus on saves.

**[[Order's Wrath (Spell)|Order’s Wrath]]****:** Harms and dazes chaotic creatures (1d8 damage/2 levels).

**[[Otyugh Swarm (Spell)|Otyugh Swarm]]****:** Creates 3d4 otyughs or 1d3+1 Huge otyughs.

## Ou-Oz
**[[Overcome Force (Spell)|Overcome Force]]****:** Subject gains immunity to force damage and can walk through a *[[Wall of Force (Spell)|wall of force]]**.*

**[[Overcompensation (Spell)|Overcompensation]]:** Weapon increases size and damage.

**[[Overland Flight (Spell)|Overland Flight]]****:** You fly at a speed of 40 ft. and can hustle over long distances.

**[[Overwhelm (Spell)|Overwhelm]]****:** Nonlethal damage knocks out subject.

**Overwhelming Grief:** Grieving target can take no actions and is denied its Dex bonus.

**Overwhelming Presence:** Creatures bow before you as if you were divine.

**[[Overwhelming Revelations (Spell)|Overwhelming Revelations]]****:** Creatures take a –2d6 penalty to Wisdom, are [[Confused|confused]] for 1 round.

**[[Owl's Acumen (Spell)|Owl’s Acumen]]****:** Subject gains 1d4 + 1 to Wis for 1 hour/level.

**[[Owl's Insight (Spell)|Owl’s Insight]]****:** Subject gains Wis bonus equal to half your level for 1 hour.

**[[Owl's Wisdom (Spell)|Owl’s Wisdom]]****:** Subject gains +4 to Wis for 1 minute/level.

**[[Owl's Wisdom, Mass (Spell)|Owl’s Wisdom, Mass]]****:** As *[[Owl's Wisdom (Spell)|owl’s wisdom]]**,* affects 1 subject/level.
